\begin{equation} \label{eqp2} 
ds^2= \frac{sin^2{\theta}}{\rho^2} \left[
\left( r^2 +a^2 \right) d\phi - a \, dt \right]^2-\frac{D}{\rho^2} \left[ 
dt - a \sin^2{ \theta } \, d\phi \right]^2 +\frac{\rho^2}{D} \, dr^2 +
{\rho^2} d\theta^2  \;,
\
